}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1244-00000755-50Z_ES" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The same PCB is used for a few different models: *[[Edimax EW-7722UTn v2]] (ext. antenna) *[[Edimax EW-7822GTN]] (int. antenna) *'''Edimax EW-7822UAN''' (ext. antenna) *[[Edimax GWU-H822GTn]] (int. antenna) *[[Edimax GWU-H822UAn]] (ext. antenna)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
